page.paragraph: Now listen to two students as they discuss the memo.
Did you see the notice in the library?
It was hard to miss it. It was posted all over the library, after all.
Are you as angry about it as I am?
Yes, I am. Very angry. It just doesn't seem fair.
Not at all. Students need to use the library, and they shouldn't be prevented from using it.
That's true, but too many students seem to be abusing their library privileges, and something has to be done about that.
You don't think that what the librarian's done is too much?
Not at all. It actually sounds fine to me.
